mapper.select: select member_info.*, major_info.major_id, major_info.major_name, college_info.college_id, college_info.college_name from member_info join class_info on member_info.class_id = class_info.class_id join major_info on class_info.major_id = major_info.major_id join college_info on major_info.college_id = college_info.college_id where uid = #{uid}
